General.Name: Peninsula Land Limited
General.Description: Peninsula Land Limited engages in the real estate development activities in India. The company develops residential complexes; commercial spaces and IT parks under the Peninsula brand; and retail malls under the Crossroads brand. It also rents properties. Peninsula Land Limited was incorporated in 1871 and is headquartered in Mumbai, India.

1.Name: Mr. Nalukettungal  Gangadharan
